means: 巴比伦王国（古代亚洲西南部一奴隶制国家）

sentence.Network_en: It was an age of historical inquiry and learning in Babylonia.
sentence.Network_cn: 这时巴比伦王国正处在一个研究和学习历史的时代.

sentence.Network_en: The Babylonia was in the path of trade routes and commerce was extensive.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴比伦位于古代贸易通道上,他们商业活动范围很广.

sentence.Network_en: It is difficult to discuss the administration of justice in Babylonia and Assyria.
sentence.Network_cn: 很难确定巴比伦和亚述的司法管辖权.

means.word_mean: 1. an ancient kingdom in southern Mesopotamia; Babylonia conquered Israel in the 6th century BC and exiled the Jews to Babylon (where the Daniel became a counselor to the king)
